content: ripple poncho requirements minimum 600 g dk yarn 3 5 mm hook for video tutorial follow the link below https //www youtube com/watch v=xoiclol6gae&feature=youtu be round 1 chain 108 slip_stitch in 1st chain begdc2tog in 1st and 2nd chain 1 double_crochet in next 2 chains 1 double_crochet ch2 1 double_crochet in next chain 1 double_crochet in next 2 chains decrease in next chain * decrease in next chain 1 double_crochet in next 2 chains 1 double_crochet ch2 1 double_crochet in next chain 1 double_crochet in next 2 chains decrease in next chain * repeat 11 times slip_stitch to 1st begdc2tog made round 2 slip_stitch in next double_crochet ch2 counts as 1st double_crochet 1 double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet 1dc ch2 1dc in ch2 space 1 double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet skip next 2 decrease * 1 double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet 1dc ch2 1dc in ch2 space 1 double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet skip next 2 decrease * repeat 11 times slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet made round 3 ch2 counts as 1st double_crochet 1 double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet 1dc ch2 1dc in ch2 space 1 double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet skip next 2 double_crochet * 1 double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet 1dc ch2 1dc in ch2 space 1 double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet skip next 2 double_crochet * repeat 11 times slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet made round 4 - 6 repeat round 3 three more times round 7 ch2 counts as 1st double_crochet 1 double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet 2dc ch2 2dc in ch2 space 1 double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet skip next 2 double_crochet * 1 double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet 2dc ch2 2dc in ch2 space 1 double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet skip next 2 double_crochet * repeat 11 times slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet made round 8 ch2 counts as 1st double_crochet 1 double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet 2dc ch2 2dc in ch2 space 1 double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet skip next 2 double_crochet * 1 double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet 2dc ch2 2dc in ch2 space 1 double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet skip next 2 double_crochet * repeat 11 times slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet made round 9 ch2 counts as 1st double_crochet 1 double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet 1dc ch2 1dc in ch2 space 1 double_crochet in next 5 double_crochet skip next 2 double_crochet * 1 double_crochet in next 5 double_crochet 1dc ch2 1dc in ch2 space 1 double_crochet in next 5 double_crochet skip next 2 double_crochet * repeat 11 times slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet made round 10 ch2 counts as 1st double_crochet 1 double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet 2dc ch2 2dc in ch2 space 1 double_crochet in next 5 double_crochet skip next 2 double_crochet * 1 double_crochet in next 5 double_crochet 2dc ch2 2dc in ch2 space 1 double_crochet in next 5 double_crochet skip next 2 double_crochet * repeat 11 times slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet made round 11 ch2 counts as 1st double_crochet 1 double_crochet in next 5 double_crochet 2dc ch2 2dc in ch2 space
